casebody.data:
Anthony GARCIA, Petitioner-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Respondent-Appellee. No. 71-2400

Summary Calendar.*

United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Nov. 9, 1971. Rehearing Denied Dec. 16, 1971. John J. Browne, Browne & Moore, Houston, Tex., for petitioner-appellant. Anthony J. P. Farris, U. S. Atty., James R. Gough, Asst. U. S. Atty., Houston, Tex., for respondent-appellee.

Before THORNBERRY, MORGAN and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

Rule 18, 5th Cir.; see Isbell Enterprises, Inc. v. Citizens Casualty Co. of New York et al., 5th Cir. 1970, 431 F.2d 409, Part I.

 PER CURIAM:

Affirmed. See Local Rule 21.1 See Nelson v. O’Neil, 402 U.S. 622, 91 S.Ct. 1723, 29 L.Ed.2d 222 (1971); Harrington v. California, 395 U.S. 250, 89 S.Ct. 1726, 23 L.Ed.2d 284 (1969).

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5th Cir. 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
